Staff Picks

Hi Wolf Iq. This is a special one. Not only do I get to tell you about some great products to streamline and grow your business, but also - spoiler alert - the platform I'm using to send this email right now! Trippy, right?

(In fact, I give Klaviyo such a thumbs up that I wrote an entire blog post about how we use it to power Woo's communications.)
Hope you find these solutions as useful as I do!

Nicola
Woo

Klaviyo

Unify your marketing and analytics into one seamless platform - and personalize your customer journey at scale with advanced, data-powered segmentation.
Klaviyo offers best-in-class marketing automation to help you drive revenue and improve retention, without adding complexity.
Tailor every touchpoint

Coinbase Commerce

Expand your audience and future-proof your business when you offer a new way to pay.
Accept hundreds of the most popular cryptocurrencies, instantly settle your funds without risk, and appeal to 100M+ verified users with Coinbase Commerce.
Accept crypto payments

Returns for WooCommerce

Make returns and exchanges effortless for you and your customers with this comprehensive solution.
Customize the experience with flexible options, automate your workflow to save time, and give customers a convenient self-service return center that improves satisfaction.
Streamline my returns

Archiva

Seamlessly archive old orders

Smart Coupons

Boost sales and win fans

Apparel

Create a chic boutique

This email was sent to support@wolfiq.com.au. You're receiving it because you opted in when creating an account, submitting a form, or checking out on WooCommerce.com.

No longer want to receive these emails? Update your preferences or unsubscribe. You may still receive transactional and/or account-related emails from WooCommerce.com.
